title: 75 Ponce De Leon Ave NE #1010
address: 75 Ponce De Leon Ave NE #1010, Atlanta, GA 30308
description: This apartment is located in the vibrant neighborhood of Midtown, Atlanta. It offers a convenient and desirable location with easy access to amenities and attractions. The unit features 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, perfect for individuals or couples. The apartment has a cooling-only A/C system, and the utilities are included in the rent. The property also offers garage parking and on-site management. With its ideal location and great amenities, this apartment is a fantastic choice for anyone looking to live in the heart of Atlanta.

importantInformation.viewings: Contact the manager for viewing arrangements.
